name: Summon Fiendish Kin
summary: You have a deep connection to the fiendish realms, allowing you to summon a fiend matching your own lineage.
description:
You have a deep connection to the fiendish realms, allowing you to summon a fiend matching your own lineage. Once per day, you can cast summon fiend as a 5th-level divine innate spell. The fiend you summon must match your own lineage.Traits

Tiefling: A creature with this trait has the tiefling versatile heritage. Tieflings are planar scions descended from fiends. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by tieflings.
